title: Johnson and friends. - Volume 3.
brief_description: Johnson, the fearless pink elephant, leads his friends in six new stories: The toys organise a surprise “Birthday party” for Johnson and must work together save their friend “Alfred” from being thrown away. “Battle of the bed”: the whole room and all the toys are at war. The toys become suspicious of themselves as McDuff loses her medal in “A case of trust.” Johnson wants to go to hospital with Michael in “Blast off” but how will he manage it? “The concert”: there was a show under the bed, it was starting that night and all the toys had stagefright!
